info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 27 at 9:36AM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF ORLEANS...MONROE...AND NIAGARA COUNTIES... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile, dropping an inch of snow in 30 minutes. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 933 AM EDT, a band of heavy snow along the south shores of Lake Ontario was moving south at 10 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Rochester, Greece, Irondequoit, Lockport, Brockport, Medina, Albion, Hilton, Hamlin Beach State Park, Newfane, Spencerport, Lewiston, Youngstown, Middleport, Holley, Waterport, Lakeside Beach State Park, Fort Niagara State Park, Sanborn and Point Breeze. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. &&
